content: It's understandable that some consumers prioritize quality and affordability when making purchasing decisions. While celebrity endorsements can be effective in increasing brand awareness and driving sales, there are other factors that contribute to a consumer's decision to buy a product, such as price, perceived value, and product performance. Brands that prioritize these factors and deliver high-quality products at competitive prices can also win the loyalty and advocacy of consumers. Ultimately, the right marketing strategy should be tailored to the unique needs and preferences of the target audience, rather than relying solely on celebrity endorsements or other marketing tactics.
